Generation VIII.Sword: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp .
Generation VIII.Shield: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon has complete control over its hair. Grimmsnarl normally keeps its hair wrapped around its body to support its muscles.
Generation IX.Violet: It lives deep within the forest. Even after evolving into this splendid form, it hasn't given up on its petty misdeeds and pranks.
